title: Ep - 46 - Below Deck's Hannah Ferrier & 90-Day Fiancé's Loren Brovarnik
description:
Hannah Ferrier from Below Deck Mediterranean discusses her reaction to Adam and Malia’s secret relationship and what happened with the hot charter guest this season. Loren Brovarnik from 90-Day Fiancé explains how she and Alex were cast for the show, whether she related to the other couples on the show, and opening up publicly about her Tourette’s Syndrome. Ronnie and Ben from Watch What Crappens podcast go through a speed round of questions about the premier episode this season of Real Housewives of Orange County. 


www.loveandknuckles.com

Facebook: facebook.com/loveandknuckles

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca
